email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is October 15-20. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider a rate in the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, can you confirm the demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve discussed with the owner, and we can offer a revised rate of $51.00 per metric ton. Demurrage is set at $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 sounds reasonable. However, could we push the laycan to October 16-21 to better align with our loading schedule? Also, can you confirm the vessel’s readiness and any additional terms? Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, the laycan adjustment to October 16-21 is confirmed. The MV Ocean Star is currently in Singapore and will be ready for loading as scheduled. All other terms remain as discussed. Shall we proceed with the fixture? Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the fixture at $51.00 per metric ton and the agreed laycan. Please send over the recap for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, please find the fixture recap attached for your review. Let me know if any adjustments are needed. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best regards, Sarah
